p: Regarding boldo essential oil (BEO), it has recently been applied, after microencapsulation, for the preservation of various commodities (e.g., peanuts) from fungal spoilage [ 7, 8, 9]. Also, important uses as a herbicide are recorded [ 10, 11]. However, it is important to note that BEO with low levels of ascaridole is preferred from a safety perspective. Recently, there has been increasing interest in a possible usage of BEO as an active ingredient in botanical insecticides [ 12, 13, 14].
